examples: Cucurbita okeechobeensis subsp martinezii (L.H. Bailey) T.C. Andres & G.P.  Nabhan ex T.W. Walters & D.S. Decker-Walters in Syst. Bot., 18(2): 186 (1993).  This name was invalidly published by Andres & Nabhan in FA0/IBPGR Plant Genetic  Resources Newsl. 75/76: 21-22 (1988).
source: IK db. First names from Tequila Nat. Cult. Hist. (2003).
